sub_title: We simplify your payments in one easy end to end solution
text: Tired of having to work with multiple companies and overlaying of fees to for your payment services?  Grandco delivers your pos software, brick and mortar sales, online sales, analytics, payment processing all under one program with no term contracts and no cancellation penalties.
